title: Simply beautiful 2 bed / 1.5 bath in prime Riverdale neighborhood
posting_body: ['RENTAL INFO', 'Rental Rates:', '$1314 - $1744/month', 'Location:', '501 Roberts Dr Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Unit for Rent:', '2-BR 1.5-BA |', 'Square Feet:', '1028 sq ft |', 'Lease Length:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'PROPERTY AMENITIES', '❖ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '❖ Controlled Access', '❖ Grill', '❖ Maintenance on site', '❖ Online Services', '❖ On-Site Management', '❖ Playground', '❖ Sparkling Swimming Pool', '❖ Sun Deck', '❖ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '❖ Clothes Care Center/Laundry Facilities', '❖ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '❖ Convenient to Hospital & Medical Facilities', '❖ Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '❖ Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '❖ Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping', '❖ Monthly Pest Control', '❖ Package Service', '❖ Resident Referral Program', 'APARTMENT AMENITIES', '❖ Ceiling Fans', '❖ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '❖ Dishwasher', '❖ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '❖ Range', '❖ Tub/Shower', '❖ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '❖ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '❖ Eat-in Kitchen', '❖ Private Patio or Balcony', '❖ Vinyl Flooring', '❖ Walk-In Closets', '❖ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '❖ Window Coverings', 'ADDITIONAL INFO', 'Description:', 'Emerald Pointe is a great location that provides its residents with spacious apartment homes and convenient amenities.', 'All residents have access to features such as a pool with free Wi-Fi, a controlled access gate, a playground, and a 24-hour emergency maintenance team!', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions 25lbs.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Emerald Pointe Apartment Homes:', 'show contact info', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '619E1DC5B7734938']
